title: Financial Administrator
text:
Vacancy Details

JOB SUMMARY Strong analytical ability to analyse various data and compile reports in a user-friendly format Strong financial / Numerical ability. Strong Excel Skills essential. RESPONSIBILITIES including, but not limited to; Completing and Issuing of Invoices and Statements in line with Clients Contracts.

Coordinating with Project Architects regarding the deliverables and forecasts for sales.

Updating and Maintaining of Sales Forecast documents and Sales Records and Reports.

Updating and Maintaining of statistical data required on Sales.

Income allocation and records.

Pastel Capturing of Sales and Maintenance of Cashbook.

Project Costing maintenance and Analysis.

Assisting with Client Queries, providing succinct answers and summaries.

Debt Collection of Long Outstanding accounts (Communicating Strategy to Project Leaders and Following through to recovery.

Travel recovery: Reconciling monthly Travel and billing accordingly.

Disbursement Recovery: Ensures all disbursements are recovered with month end Billing procedures.

Responsible to assist the company’s annual audit on Debtors.

Required Skills

Candidate Requirements

This position reports to: Financial Director

Companies may expire jobs at their own discretion.

If you have not received a response within two weeks, your application was most likely unsuccessful.
